Half-life is a chemistry term. Chemistry is taught in high school. High school has students. The word "students" has eight letters. Octopi have 8 legs. Octopi live in the ocean. The ocean has waves. The symbol of half life is the symbol of wavelength in physics. Wavelength determines the magnitude of a light ray. The word "ray" has 3 letters. Half-Life 3 confirmed.
отличная игра своего времени!

This week was the first time i finnished this game ever. Its a great game. I like the story, the campaign. But i will tell you this: Everyone will view this game differentely. While i think that, i like this game less than people who actually played this in the 90s, people who play more newer games like Wolfenstein, or Battlefield 1, will think this game is crap. Because it looks old and ugly. But its a good game, a nice classic to play. I think that every steam gamer should have this in their Game Library, and have at least beaten the game once in their life. Also, i cant wait to play Half-Life 2 for the first time, and after that of course, Half-Life 3.
La verda este juego me encanta mucho que aunque me pase la historia lo sigo jugando
Не надо слов... 10/10

As a big fan of id Software FPS games (Doom/Quake) in the 90's, Half-Life just blew me away the first time i played it back in 99, what an amazing FPS experience.

Below is some features of Half-Life that stood out for me at the time when i first played it.

- Immersive storytelling (No cutscenes required)
- Great level design
- Excellent graphics and sound
- Unique weapons (including a laser guided RPG which follows your crosshair!)
- Enemies of all types (Zombies, Humans & Aliens)
- Advanced AI (including roach ai)
- The HEV Suit
- G-Man

Uno de los mejores juegos de todos los tiempos y no sin motivos, marcó un antes y un despues. Funciona en cualquier PC y esta baratisimo durante las ofertas de invierno. NO TENES EXCUSA PARA NO JUGARLO
Classic game, that must be in your library!

[h1] HALF LIFE [/h1]

[u] ''Half-Life'' [/u] uzun bir tren yolculuğu ile başlıyor.
Bu yolculuk sırasında [u] Gordon Freeman'' [/u] adlı bir bilim adamını canlandırdığımızı, bu kişinin [u] ''Black Mesa Araştırma Tesisi‘'nde [/u] çalıştığını, Freeman’ın yetişmesi gereken bir deneye yarım saat geç kaldığını öğreniyoruz ve hikayemiz çok ilginç yerlere dallanıp budaklanıyor.
Half-Life bir yolculuk hikayesi ve bu yüzden asla hikayeden kopma yaşamadan çok güzel bir şekilde hikayeye kapılıp gidiyorsunuz.

Half-Life'ı çıktığı zamana göre değerlendirecek olursak oyun kesinlikle bir başyapıt.
Birinci şahıs nişancı oyun türüne yön vermiş mekanikleriyle ve oyun içi nesne etkileşimleriyle zamanının ilerisinde bir oyun olduğunu belli ediyor.
Oyun içi müzikleri, düşman çeşitliliği, spesifik level dizaynı, ilerledikçe çeşitlenen oynanış dinamikleri ve karşınızda gerçek düşman olduğu hissi uyandıran gerçekçi yapay zekasıyla 1998 yılında bu oyunu nasıl yapmışlar diye hayrete düşürüyor.
Hala gizemi çözülememiş [u] ''G-Man ve Nihilanth'' [/u] ilişkisi ile Half-Life'ın hikayesi merak uyandırıyor.
Multiplayer modu yıllar geçmesine rağmen hala çok zevkli.

[h1] İNCELEME PUANI : 88 / 100 [/h1]

I played this game a long time ago when I was just a boy, and it used to terrify me, lol!   I was never really allowed to play mature games at the time, but I wanted to come back to it and replay what I never finished.  Game is great, story is great, may have bad graphics, but that's what I bought it for.  I wanted nostalgia when I played and that's what I got.   Ignore those negative reviews, and play for yourself if you have or haven't already played.   I would tell the story, but some people probably never played this, but for those who did, you know.   I give 10/10 for this amazing game.  EDIT: Wanted to update this review since I literally didn't really give a review, lol. 1 person found it helpful, but I didn't give any detail.   Also, if you liked this, go play some DOOM or DOOM Eternal.

One of the best games I've played, and it's beyond my head how many has enjoyed it before me even in THEIR childhood.

10/10, or beyond a 10 if even, also has very amazing mods to go with it such as The Specialists 3.0, and Master Sword Continued v1.2; get out there and enjoy the game, and play from their amazing modding community!

Халф Лайф в стиме говно. Все текстуры обновили, они красивые, но всё стало только хуже в плане дизайна. Модели оружия заменили на какое-то непривычное (например MP5 превратилась в M16, а лаконичный глок в берету), а что сильнее удручает, так это то, что половина скриптов либо лагает, либо вообще не работает. Может это у меня из-за запуска на Mac OS, но вот у меня прям в тестовой камере, после того как я вставил кристал и после того как покидало между мирами, то со мной рядом остаётся один вартигонец, и меня безоружного начинает избивать своими молниями. 

Не пробовал ещё Half-Life Source. Одна надежда, что там скрипты рабочие и текстуры классические.

Que dire ?! LE titre qui à propulsé le FPS dans la modernité, à tout point de vue, réalisation, technologie, gameplay, gamedesign, multijoueur.... absolument TOUT dans ce jeu est le terrau des FPS post Half-Life (après 1998 donc).
Une claque, une expérience unique, un pillier poussiereux mais toujours solide comme au premier jour.
C'est la Joconde du FPS.

Half life was a great game for its time. It was light years ahead in the fps genre. However, in 2017, it is just an old game. If you played this game when it was still revolutionary, then the nostalgia of replaying this may make it a great purchase for you. Unfortunately for us gamers who buy this game thinking it was still a a great game in 2017, it just isn't. 

in 1998-2005 10/10
in 2017 5/10
